DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to learn more about the outcomes of treatment of throat and voice box cancers using transoral robotic surgery (TORS). TORS is a relatively new option involving the use of the da Vinci surgical robot to remove these cancers through the mouth.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of TORS for SCCA
DOC.criteria: Adult male or female Diagnosis of either oropharyngeal or supraglottic squamous cell carcinoma Metastatic disease
DOC.keyword: squamous cell of head and neck
